message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I am offering it for $1,150,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic worth to you and my valuation, aiming to ensure both parties are satisfied with the transaction. I look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I recognize the value of the product, but I believe your asking price is a little high. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $1,050,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to engage in this discussion. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a revised offer of $1,100,000 for the product. This price aims to balance our interests while still reflecting the significant value this product holds for your business. I hope we can reach an agreement that is satisfactory to both parties.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, $1,075,000 is the highest I can go.  If that works for you, we have a deal.
